fe71d33033d178f7c437938313a213746f3662c3.summary: Project converter: Remove Tween properties/signals from renames
fe71d33033d178f7c437938313a213746f3662c3.body:
The Tween class in Godot 3 is fully incompatible with Godot 4, there's no point
doing these renames. It also makes it harder to use Threen, my (currently WIP)
forward-port of the Godot 3 Tween to Godot 4.

(cherry picked from commit 0171037e0a32b860f60859a0da9d08c6681e690f)

0171037e0a32b860f60859a0da9d08c6681e690f.summary: Project converter: Remove Tween properties/signals from renames
0171037e0a32b860f60859a0da9d08c6681e690f.body:
The Tween class in Godot 3 is fully incompatible with Godot 4, there's no point
doing these renames. It also makes it harder to use Threen, my (currently WIP)
forward-port of the Godot 3 Tween to Godot 4.

838a82f8858c859a9ceda4049904bf263604cbd4.summary: Update GPUParticles2D/3D speed scale on ENTER_TREE
838a82f8858c859a9ceda4049904bf263604cbd4.body:
Fix for https://github.com/godotengine/godot/issues/75218

Pause notifications are not sent when a node is added as a child. So GPUParticles2D should also obey its can_process status on ENTER_TREE, not just PAUSED/UNPAUSED.

(cherry picked from commit 4652fbd09e81741a146c7dd1dcc89bf4235bdb75)

4652fbd09e81741a146c7dd1dcc89bf4235bdb75.summary: Update GPUParticles2D/3D speed scale on ENTER_TREE
4652fbd09e81741a146c7dd1dcc89bf4235bdb75.body:
Fix for https://github.com/godotengine/godot/issues/75218

Pause notifications are not sent when a node is added as a child. So GPUParticles2D should also obey its can_process status on ENTER_TREE, not just PAUSED/UNPAUSED.

ff15e2384ab65d5f408cee4c9b62639ddfaf5272.summary: Configure maven central snapshot versions for the Godot Android library
ff15e2384ab65d5f408cee4c9b62639ddfaf5272.body:
A snapshot version is a version that has not yet been released which allows us to deploy the same transient version incrementally, without requiring projects to upgrade the artifact version they're consuming. Those projects can use the same version to get an updated snapshot version.

(cherry picked from commit a5fdc955158502d99fca4865aa2dffa4d832312d)

a5fdc955158502d99fca4865aa2dffa4d832312d.summary: Configure maven central snapshot versions for the Godot Android library
a5fdc955158502d99fca4865aa2dffa4d832312d.body: A snapshot version is a version that has not yet been released which allows us to deploy the same transient version incrementally, without requiring projects to upgrade the artifact version they're consuming. Those projects can use the same version to get an updated snapshot version.

4750b77d2d52a2ba0b6fe79ddb5f27bdc051cbe1.summary: Fix typos and inconsistencies in classref
4750b77d2d52a2ba0b6fe79ddb5f27bdc051cbe1.body:
* Typo fixes.
* Navigation agent's `velocity_computed` signal is not emitted by
`set_velocity`, but at the end of that frame if `set_velocity` is
called.
* Simplify link in navigation agent's `avoidance_enabled` description.
* Unify `navigation_layers` description across `NavigationAgent{2,3}D`.
* Unify `is_normalized()` description across `Vector2`, `Vector3`, and
`Vector4`

(cherry picked from commit ff97c481d367a8c4e72b6548095ce33c98e4ef33)

ff97c481d367a8c4e72b6548095ce33c98e4ef33.summary: Fix typos and inconsistencies in classref
ff97c481d367a8c4e72b6548095ce33c98e4ef33.body:
* Typo fixes.
* Navigation agent's `velocity_computed` signal is not emitted by
`set_velocity`, but at the end of that frame if `set_velocity` is
called.
* Simplify link in navigation agent's `avoidance_enabled` description.
* Unify `navigation_layers` description across `NavigationAgent{2,3}D`.
* Unify `is_normalized()` description across `Vector2`, `Vector3`, and
`Vector4`

e61a127042b183caa713a0eff852f26cdedbc2c0.body:
Removes some outdated/incorrect/duplicated info, adds correct info.
Also removes no longer applicable "editor-only helper" statements.

3cae980c178905ac5be51c168698af7b355c4e9c.summary: Fix some ways to create inconsistent Viewport sizes
3cae980c178905ac5be51c168698af7b355c4e9c.body:
In the editor, it was possible to set the size of a `SubViewport` even
in cases where a parent `SubViewportContainer` had stretch enabled.

This PR disables editing a `SubViewport.size` while the parent disallows
it and it makes necessary adjustments during `NOTIFICATION_ENTER_TREE`.

(cherry picked from commit 34a7fc744762dcf66eff7e3b5e4d46e09e7c0bdc)

34a7fc744762dcf66eff7e3b5e4d46e09e7c0bdc.summary: Fix some ways to create inconsistent Viewport sizes
34a7fc744762dcf66eff7e3b5e4d46e09e7c0bdc.body:
In the editor, it was possible to set the size of a `SubViewport` even
in cases where a parent `SubViewportContainer` had stretch enabled.

This PR disables editing a `SubViewport.size` while the parent disallows
it and it makes necessary adjustments during `NOTIFICATION_ENTER_TREE`.
